DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at how feasible it is to incorporate a state-of-the-art smoking cessation treatment program into community substance abuse treatment programs and its impact on substance abuse and cigarette smoking.
DOC.brief_title: Smoking Cessation Treatment With Transdermal Nicotine Replacement Therapy - 1
DOC.criteria: Patient is alcohol or drug dependent, in Outpatient DrugFree or Opiate Substitute program and is interested in quitting smoking Patient is psychotic Use of smokeless tobacco Use of other smoking cessasation product Pregnancy Patient has hypertension, heart problems, or skin condition
